SELECT detail_num, d.order_num, d.item_id, item_cnt, price, title, author, publisher, total_price, cover FROM order_detail d JOIN book b ON d.item_id = b.item_id JOIN book_order o ON d.order_num = o.order_num where d.order_num = #{orderNum}
